greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence combining A000035(n) (parity of n), A003557(n), and A046523(n) (prime signature of n).
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of triple [A000035(n), A003557(n), A046523(n)], or equally, of triple [A007814(n), A003557(n), A046523(n)], or equally, of ordered pair [A000035(n), A291757(n)].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A003557(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 2] = f[i, 2]-1); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 24 2018
